Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_1
Text.Desc: A secret body created by using Ethereal Essence as the core. Practice it to the extreme and once True Qi is generated, the arm can become invisible and render the enemy defenseless.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Moderately increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.\n Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Moderately increase the secret body's artifact suppression chance.\n Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration rate.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_1_1
Text.Desc: An entry-level secret body for physical cultivators, easy to achieve with well-balanced components and considerable development potential.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Drastically increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.\n Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Moderately increase the secret body's artifact suppression chance.\n Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration rate.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_2
Text.Desc: A secret body that draws energy from the heart and generates extremely hot True Qi, which normal Qi barriers are completely unable to effectively fend off.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a large amount.\n Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration rate.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_3
Text.Desc: A secret body that draws energy from the kidneys and generates extremely cold True Qi. Excels at artifact suppression.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a large amount.\n Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration rate.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_4
Text.Desc: Remolds the hand muscles with Lunar Essence to make it agile as a specters which nothing can permeate through.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.\n Moderately increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.\n Moderately increases the secret body defense success rate.\n Moderately increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_5
Text.Desc: A legendary secret body used by an ancient sage physical cultivator. Legend has it that the sage became as fast as lightning after achieving the secret body and chased the sun.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Moderately increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body attack accuracy.\n Drastically increases the secret body defense success rate.\n Drastically increases the physical cultivator's global dodge.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_6
Text.Desc: Remolds the body with Ethereal Essence to effectively interrupt the attacker's movement.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body defense success rate.\n Drastically increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Drastically increases the physical cultivator's global dodge.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_7
Text.Desc: Remolds the flesh in the arms into a mutated form that can extend granulation tissues to strangle nearby foreign objects. Extremely evil and strange.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body defense success rate.\n Drastically increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc:
Drastically increases the secret body defense success rate.
 Drastically increases the secret body's artifact suppression chance.
 Drastically increases the artifact suppression chance of the physical cultivator's secret bodies.
 Drastically reduces charisma.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_8
Text.Desc: Remolds all the flesh into a mutated form that grows out numerous strange eyes to perceive any change around them, leaving the enemy no chance to attack.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc:
Moderately increases the attack accuracy of the physical cultivator's secret bodies.
 Moderately increases the defense success rate of the physical cultivator's secret bodies.
 Moderately increases the artifact suppression chance of the physical cultivator's secret bodies.
 Drastically reduces charisma.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc:
Drastically increases the attack accuracy of the physical cultivator's secret bodies.
 Drastically increases the defense success rate of the physical cultivator's secret bodies.
 Drastically increases the artifact suppression chance of the physical cultivator's secret bodies.
 Reduces charisma by a huge amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_9
Text.Desc: Mutates all the bones to make them able to break through the skin and cover the whole body with a bone shell to resist damage when necessary.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.\n Increases the secret body defense success rate by a huge amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_10
Text.Desc: Remolds the heart with objects of true evil and makes it generate strange True Qi. Using this remold can effectively increase the result. If this method is used to remold the heart, it can mutate and develop potential for the evolution of all the flesh.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_5_11
Text.Desc: Remolds the spine with objects of true evil and makes it generate strange True Qi. Generating this kind of True Qi can accelerate the metabolism of the whole body, drastically increase the consumption rate of lifespan and acquire some special skills.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
